title: Open browser fails on github codespaces
body:
Trying to open dev ui or website results in error: 

```
2022-04-10 13:33:08,848 ERROR Lio.qua.ver.htt.dep.dev.con.DevConsoleProcessor](AeshInputstreamReader)FailedtolatAch
[> GitHub Co.
browser: java.io.I0Exception: Cannot run program "xdg-open": error=2, No such file or directory
at java. base/java. lang.ProcessBuilder.start (ProcessBuilder.java:1128)
at java.base/java. lang.ProcessBuilder.start (ProcessBuilder.java:1071)
at java.base/java.lang.Runtime.exec (Runtime. java: 592)
at java.base/java. lang.Runtime.exec (Runtime. java: 451)
at io.quarkus.vertx.http.deployment.devmode.console.DevConsoleProcessor.openBrowser(DevConsoleProcessor.java:511)
at io.quarkus.vertx.http.deployment.devmode.console.DevConsoleProcessor.lambda$setupConsole$1(DevConsoleProcessor.
java: 483)
at io.quarkus.deployment.console.ConsoleStateManager$1.accept(ConsoleStateManager.java:73)
at io.quarkus.deployment.console. ConsoleStateManager$1.accept (ConsoleStateManager. java: 46)
at io.quarkus.deployment. console.AeshConsole. lambdassetups1 (AeshConsole. java:275)
at org.ash. terminal. EventDecoder.accept (EventDecoder.java:118)
at org.ash. terminal. EventDecoder.accept (EventDecoder. java: 31)
at org.aesh.terminal.io.Decoder.write(Decoder.java:133)
at org.aesh.readline.tty.terminal.TerminalConnection.openBlocking(TerminalConnection.java:216)
```

Would be great if

A) print url attempted to open rather than the raw error.

B) find way to open webpage in code or the surrounding browser
